Actions.Name: Create project
Actions.Description: This operation is used to create a new Teamwork project.

Actions.Name: Create task
Actions.Description: This operation is used to create a new task.

Actions.Name: Create user
Actions.Description: This operation is used to create a new user.

Actions.Name: Delete task
Actions.Description: This operation is used to delete a task.

Actions.Name: Get project
Actions.Description: This operation returns all properties asosciated with a specific project, given its id.

Actions.Name: Get task
Actions.Description: This operation returns all properties asosciated with a specific task, given its id.

Actions.Name: Get user
Actions.Description: This operation is used to get all details of a user.

Actions.Name: List projects
Actions.Description: This operation returns a list of all projects associated with your account.

Actions.Name: List tasks
Actions.Description: This operation is used to return a list of tasks for a given project.

Actions.Name: List users
Actions.Description: This operation returns a list of all users asosciated with a specific project.

Actions.Name: Update task
Actions.Description: This operation is used to update the properties of a specific task.

Actions.Name: When a project is created
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a new project is created.

Actions.Name: When a task is created
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a new task is created.

Actions.Name: When a user is created
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a new user is created.
